meanings.definition: Of or relating to the yolk of an egg.
meanings.sent1: The vitelline color of the egg yolk was rich and vibrant.
meanings.sent2: The chef used vitelline yolks to make a delicious custard.
meanings.sent3: The vitelline hue of the sunrise made the morning sky look like a giant egg.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as warm and comforting as a vitelline embrace.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted with a vitelline palette, creating stunning works of art.

meanings.definition: Resembling or containing the yolk of an egg.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a vitelline texture, moist and rich.
meanings.sent2: The fabric had a vitelline sheen that caught the light beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The vitelline pattern on the wallpaper looked like cracked eggshells.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and cheerful as a vitelline sun.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated in a vitelline theme, with yellow accents everywhere.
